{{Wireless embedded system |brand=8devices |model=Jalapeno |revision= |price=129 |est_release_date= |manuf_country=EU |is_manuf=No |type=module |fcc_date=10/12/2018 |fcc_id=Z9W-JLP |ic_id=11468A-JLP |pcb_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.5 |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018;Q, IPQ4018, 0VV, NE624F9X, E062400; |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice <!-- FCC images: Winbond W25 SPI --> |fla1_model=GD5F1GQ4RCYIG |fla2=8 |fla2_brand=Winbond |fla2_model=W25Q64FVIQ |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Alliance Memory <!-- FCC images: Micron D9PTK --> |ram1_model=AS4C128M16D3L-12BIN |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072;Q, QCA8072, 0VV, PEP3525, UG61400; |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=2 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot=CaraBoot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui=C4:93:00 |oui_eth=C4:93:00 }} {{TagLine|Quad-core CPU based module}} :''with Dual Band 802.11ac Wave2 radio'' :{{ProductPage|https://www.8devices.com/products/jalapeno}}
;Development board details: # Jalapeno module # 2x 1000Base-T Ethernet ports # 2x USB Type-A sockets (2.0 and 3.0) # Mini USB Type-A socket (console + power) # Buttons (reset and user - GPIO connected) # UART, JTAG, I2S, TDM, SPI, 63x GPIO # 2.45mm pitch prototyping are holes # Heatsink mounting screws # External LEDs
